Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###DisplayLinksName
Setting.Description: Whether links name should be displayed in the CMDB explorer graph or not

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###RootNodeColor
Setting.Description: Fillcolor of the Root node. The root node is the one that's currently displayed in the AgentITSMConfigItemZoom screen.

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###DisplayedNodeColor
Setting.Description: Defines the fillcolor of the nodes that have been specificaly selected by the agent for inclusion in the graph.

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###LinkDefaultColor
Setting.Description: Default link color (must be a valid graphviz color)

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###LinkDefaultFontColor
Setting.Description: Default link font's color when link labels are displayed (must be a valid graphviz color).

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###LinkFontSize
Setting.Description: Font size for the link labels (if displayed)

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###LinkStyles
Setting.Description: Defines the styles (eg: filled, dotted) that will be user for rendering links in the explorer graph. Values must be valid graphviz edge style (see dot's man page).

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###LinkArrows
Setting.Description: Defines which arrows must be drawn for links in the explorer graph. Values must be valid graphviz edge dir (see dot's man page).

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###NodeDefaultColor
Setting.Description: Default node color (must be a valid graphviz color)

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###NodeDefaultFillColor
Setting.Description: Default node fillcolor (must be a valid graphviz color)

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###NodeFontSize
Setting.Description: Font size for the node labels

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###NodeShapes
Setting.Description: Defines the shapes (eg: box, ellipse, none) that will be user for rendering nodes in the explorer graph. Values must be valid graphviz node shape (see dot's man page).

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions::LayoutOptions###dot
Setting.Description: Defines rendering options for the 'dot' graphviz layout. Values must be valid graphviz options for the selected layout (see dot's man page).

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions::LayoutOptions###neato
Setting.Description: Defines rendering options for the 'neato' graphviz layout. Values must be valid graphviz options for the selected layout (see dot's man page).

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions::LayoutOptions###twopi
Setting.Description: Defines rendering options for the 'twopi' graphviz layout. Values must be valid graphviz options for the selected layout (see dot's man page).

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions::LayoutOptions###circo
Setting.Description: Defines rendering options for the 'circo' graphviz layout. Values must be valid graphviz options for the selected layout (see dot's man page).

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions::LayoutOptions###fdp
Setting.Description: Defines rendering options for the 'fdp' graphviz layout. Values must be valid graphviz options for the selected layout (see dot's man page).

Setting.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions::LayoutOptions###sfdp
Setting.Description: Defines rendering options for the 'sfdp' graphviz layout. Values must be valid graphviz options for the selected layout (see dot's man page).
